resources.string: Couldn\'t connect to server, please check your internet connection.
Something went wrong. Please try again later.
Internal server error with code:%d, and the failure reason: %s
The request was malformed or invalid. Please check your input and try again.
You are not authorized to access this resource. Please log in and try again.
Access to this resource is forbidden. You do not have the required permissions.
The requested resource could not be found. Please check the URL or try again later.
An unexpected error occurred (HTTP %1$d). Please try again later or contact support.
An I/O error occurred while accessing local storage
Data corruption detected in local storage
Unsupported data type for local storage
You can change your country or language any time from menu
